comment._content:
a Pacific Island Base.. WW II  ?
The  3  Aircraft at  the  back , are   ' PBY  Flying Boats ' ..Catalinas  ' -  Air-recon '  / Search & Rescue/ or  Anti shipping, Night time ..attack ' Black-Cats ' maybe..?
The  'Fighter' aircraft ... ? ??  (got  Big ,tall tails...)

Probably  Anti-Aircraft, or  Ground defence ...

comment.author: 76817077@N08
comment._content: My Mother in law left us many photos of US presence in New Guinea. She described flying in and out of an airbase on the other side of the island from a dense jungle M.A.S.H. quarters where she was a surgical nurse. I believe this is the drer windward side. They were under regular attacks.
